metadata.name: Stolen Breath
metadata.description:
My breath was stolen. While he painted my portrait, it was as if I were dissolving into space. Ultimately, all that was left of me was a lifeless shell. 
But it wasn't the end at all. My soul was given a new life, in a new body, in a new century, but I remember everything... remembered when I saw my old portrait.  
Now I'm looking for that man to take his breath, too...
